effect.en: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.
effect.fr: Lancez 4 pièces. Cette attaque inflige 10 dégâts pour chaque côté face.
effect.es: Lanza 4 monedas. Este ataque hace 10 puntos de daño por cada cara.
effect.it: Lancia quattro volte una moneta. Questo attacco infligge 10 danni ogni volta che esce testa.
effect.pt: Jogue 4 moedas. Este ataque causa 10 pontos de dano para cada cara.
effect.de: Wirf 4 Münzen. Diese Attacke fügt 10 Schadenspunkte pro Kopf zu.

description.en: Its restlessness has it constantly running around. If it sees another Pokémon, it will purposely run into them in order to start a fight.
